para.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, a rent increase for a residential property not prohibited by the provisions of § 42-3509.04(c), shall be prohibited during a period for which a public health emergency has been declared pursuant to § 7-2304.01, and for 30 days thereafter.

Notwithstanding any other provision of law, a rent increase for a commercial retail property or a commercial property that is less than 6,500 square feet in size shall be prohibited during a period for which a public health emergency has been declared pursuant to § 7-2304.01, and for 30 days thereafter.
